text:
Hello, hello!

I'm looking to use HubSpot's template setup service to move my site from a GoDaddy managed wordpress site built with Elementor to HubSpot CMS.

What information do I need in my header/footer and for typography to ensure a successful template setup?

My website is <http://samsonmedia.co|samsonmedia.co> for reference if needed.
you need basic styling done from your WordPress website like body,h1,h2,form style etc  can start with HubSpot boilerplate for starting
Hi <@U014JRZ096U> , did you get this resolved or do you still need help?
